name: Emerge India Foundation

briefDescription: Warm welcome, We are  a public charitable trust . Inspiration beloved Dr.APJ.Abdul kalam, we do any thing & every thing  to Ignite the minds of 131 crores of people to  transform their  lives and  free them from sufferings & pains. kindly visit www.emergeindiafoundation.com and also our 17 videos in you tube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lVRKd10IEkYWe are working on scientific approach aiming for permanent solution to fix the people’s problems at it’s root cause along with simultaneous “Immediate containment actions to Improve the quality of life. Through “centre for excellences / village support groups”  on-line & off _line (1:1)We Just Got our 80G by Oct 2015 and small staff  of 4 growing rapidly but, large volunteers.
